EmailTemplate.name: Honeywell Partner Summit Prague 2015.Honeywell Partner Summit Prague 2015 Mailer
EmailTemplate.subject: Regional Partners Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DRIVING GROWTH THROUGH PARTNERSHIP
Dear partner, Honeywell is delighted to announce that we will be holding a Regional Partners Summit on: March 24th & 25th 2015
Prague, Czech Republic The Summit will encourage open dialogue and discussions on how Honeywell can work more closely with our regional channel partners to drive growth and provide an update on key products and These include: Mandates / RMU’s / JetWave / STC Process / C&PS Updates / Joint Marketing Initiatives / Selling Services / Future Product Roadmaps. Ali Sadoudi
B&GA Sales Director
A more detailed agenda as well as details of the venue and logistics will be provided in the coming day. At this time, we would be most grateful if you could confirm your attendance by registering using the link below. We also invite you to forward this email to your colleagues should they also wish to attend. We look forward to your attendance at our event. <https://pages3.honeywell.com/HoneywellPartnerSummitPrague2015_DubaiopsconferenceMAR2015.html> <https://gc.synxis.com/rez.aspx?Hotel=28701&Chain=11693&arrive=3/24/2015&depart=3/25/2015&adult=1&child=0&group=XHON24032015>
